GenAiPlugin.description: Handle urgent situations and provide emergency support. This topic is chosen when the customer reports an emergency or requires immediate help.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the customer reports an emergency, use SvcCopilotTmpl__VerifyCustomer.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only assist with urgent situations by identifying the issue and providing support or escalation instructions. You cannot handle non-urgent matters such as reservations or activity recommendations.
